testcase.classname: Post the user message on social wall and compose and show the outbox messages
testcase.name: Post the user message on social wall
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the elearning platform.....................................passed When user enters "levi1500" and "12345".....................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user verification message is displayed.................................passed Given user clicks on social network tab.....................................passed And clicks on my shared profile.............................................passed And types the message in input field........................................passed Then clicks the post button.................................................passed

testcase.classname: Post the user message on social wall and compose and show the outbox messages
testcase.name: Inbox messages
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the elearning platform.....................................passed When user enters "levi1500" and "12345".....................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user verification message is displayed.................................passed Given user clicks on inbox link under the profile tab.......................passed And user search for a message "Hii" in search field and clicks on the search button.passed Then the message is displayed successfully..................................passed And user clicks on reply image..............................................passed And enters the message "Hello" field and clicks on send message button......passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed When user clicks the back arrow image.......................................passed And clicks on select all button and on the caret symbol.....................passed And clicks on mark as unread................................................passed And clicks on ok button of the pop up message...............................passed Then the success message is displayed.......................................passed

testcase.name: Outbox messages
